welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Brierfield, a charming town in the heart of the United Kingdom known for its rich history and natural beauty. We invite you to explore our quaint streets, vibrant culture, and stunning landscapes during your stay. Enjoy your time here and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 at Leeds/Bradford Airport is dedicated to low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warton Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Warton Airport handles all air freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linton-On-Ouse Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Linton-On-Ouse Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
